short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple memory game to guess a six-digit number. Improves Cognitive thinking. Created using Vanilla Javascript, and research at UHV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mission:  
Introducing MemBoost, a Chrome plugin designed to keep your mind sharp! Based on research and inspired by programming concepts from the University of Houston Victoria, MemBoost utilizes a fun memory game.  Simply put, a six-digit number appears for 5 seconds. Remember it correctly and another challenge awaits! Play throughout your online day, while shopping or watching videos, and strengthen your memory with every game. MemBoost - keeping your mind active, wherever you browse on Chrome.

Features:
- Inbuilt timer with a countdown 
- Input Button 
- Correctness Algorithm 

Tools:
- Vanilla Javascript
- Tailwind CSS
- HTML

Version: v1.0 Beta
